programme.title: Best of the Earthshot Prize 2022
programme.desc: The Earthshot Prize 2022 is a global prize designed to incentivise change and help to repair our planet by awarding five winners each year for their contributions to environmentalism.

programme.title: Accelerate
programme.desc: An in-depth exploration of the science, ethos and implications of near-future transportation methods.

programme.title: Bloomberg Chief Future Officer
programme.desc: Chief Financial Officers now play a critical role in shaping corporate strategy and positioning organisations to meet future challenges - this programme profiles them.

programme.title: From the Ground Up
programme.desc: Bloomberg's Francine Lacqua speaks to chief executives and business leaders about what motivates them, the lessons they have learned and the challenges they face in their industries.

programme.desc: Providing key news and information through in-depth analysis along with exclusive interviews with some of the most influential names in finance.

programme.desc: David Westin speaks with top names in finance about the week's biggest issues on Wall Street.

programme.title: The David Rubenstein Show
programme.desc: Follow financier and philanthropist David Rubenstein as he travels around the US to interview some notable people, his peers, in order to find out what makes them such good leaders and so successful. He will talk to some of the most influential people in business and politics, hearing their life stories and how they became people thay are today.

programme.title: Beyond Innovation
